transcript: it's hard to know if someone wants you to win but it's easy to know if they don't there's probably small things that someone have said to you that made you think I don't really think they're rooting for me and you're usually right it's just that the logic side's like well I don't want to lose the relationship you know is it that big of a deal but for me if I have a small hesitation then I usually know where that leads and I would rather just avoid it altogether and the real real is that most people don't root for you but I would rather have a life with a few people that I know have my back than a life with many people with knives pointed at my back
